about.title: About Veronika Raum
about.subtitle: Standing at the intersection of medical science and visual artistry with a unique dual expertise.
about.paragraph1: With parallel paths in medicine and visual storytelling, I bring a rare perspective to healthcare communication. My active medical education ensures scientific precision, while my mastery of professional visual equipment enables compelling storytelling.
about.paragraph2: Based in Munich, I exclusively serve the healthcare sector, partnering with medical technology startups, private practitioners, hospitals, and healthcare companies to elevate their visual communication strategies.

process.title: Working Process
process.subtitle: A transparent approach designed for medical professionals
process.step1Desc: In-depth consultation on medical communication objectives, audience analysis, and compliance considerations.
process.step2Desc: Shot list development with medical precision, environment assessment, and timeline development aligned with medical operations.
process.step3Desc: On-site filming with minimal disruption, strict adherence to sterile protocols, and scientific accuracy verification.
process.step4Desc: Medical accuracy review, color grading for clinical accuracy, and compliance verification before delivery.
process.step5Desc: Final outputs delivered in multiple formats, usage guidance, and archive maintenance for future content needs.
